Lde/ecspride/Button4;->onCreate:(Landroi: The method originates and stores user personal data (IMEI) in the 'imei' static field.
Lde/ecspride/Button4;->sendMessage:(Land: Sensitive user data (IMEI) is retrieved and used to send an SMS message with a hardcoded prefix (+49). The method does not definitively pass tainted data to any other methods.
